title: Pax Skins
body: I have a question about Pax, does every Pax have riot people there or just one Pax like Pax East?

replies.body:
Hey DebuPanda! 

We've scaled back our presence at NA events, as compared to previous years. You can find out more about that [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/eW1esQvu-na-live-events-in-2015). 

TL;DR, we'll still have speaker panels and the Cospitality Lounge. I'm not sure what the case may be for PAX Australia, since I'm personally only familiar with NA changes.
